Package server.sharedRegions

Class GeneralRepos

java.lang.Object
server.sharedRegions.GeneralRepos
public class GeneralRepos
extends java.lang.Object
Implementation of the Repository Shared Memory. Responsible for logging all changes during the program run.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Instantiation of a general repository object.
